title: Document search
content:
Looking for the "Recnet sduties at Cmadribge Uinevritsy..."

whene you read text, its all jumbled, but you can still read it?

its for a psych class, i dont need the bhouma work, i already have that.

the cambridge one is a contemporary internet forward that makes reference to a MUCH older study.
author: Chris Dean

comments.content:
Wasnt this just some HOAX that acidentally actually worked, but no 'real' study?
